title: S12 Ep239: The Million Dollar Paranormal Challenge
itunes:title: The Million Dollar Paranormal Challenge
description:
In 2006, The Amazing Randi was offering one million dollars to anyone who could prove to him (and a group of scientists) through scientific tests that the paranormal exists. Paranormal Investigator Lou Gentile appeared to step up and take that challenge. Today's program documents that journey, and where it went wrong. and also where things stand today! Shows originally aired May 2006 and July 2008.

Subscribe to True Crime Tuesday Here: www.Patreon.com/truecrimetuesday
